title: Deals: M2 iPad Air 11″ for $499, iPad Air 13″ for $799, Apple Watch Series 10 for $329

author: OSXDaily
excerpt: Amazon is at it again with even more great deals on some popular Apple products, including the iPad Air in both 13″ and 11″ display sizes, great deals on Apple Watch Series 10, and an o…
text: Amazon is at it again with even more great deals on some popular Apple products, including the iPad Air in both 13″ and 11″ display sizes, great deals on Apple Watch Series 10, and an ongoing great deal on the 4-pack of AirTags. Why pay full price when you don’t have to? Check out the deals! M2 iPad Air 13″ or 11″ – $499 & $799 ($100 off) Amazon is offering nice discounts on the M2 iPad Air series, in both 13″ and 11″ screen sizes. The deals take at least $100 off the retail price, but if you want much larger storage you can get up to $200 off on those models too. The M2 iPad Air features flicker-free LCD display, M2 chip with Apple Intelligence support, 12MP front camera with center stage, 12MP rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, 128GB starting storage, and there are multiple color options available along with both the 13″ and 11″ screen sizes. 13″ M2 iPad Air – $799 (down from $899) 11″ M2 iPad Air – $499 (down from $599) Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) The latest Apple Watch Series 10 model is available at a great 18% discount on Amazon, coming in at just $329, and down from the $399 retail price from Apple. Explore the different color and band options, and find one that you like best. Apple Watch Series 10 has some great features like a larger 42mm always-on display, all-day battery life, fitness and activity tracking, a heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, water resistance, voice control, Siri, and more. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP) AirTags 4-pack for $70 (down from $99) AirTags great little tracking devices to keep track of your stuff, whether it’s luggage, a backpack, pets, belongings, purse, car keys, dog, cat, packages, a car, bike, scooter, you name it. These are super handy, and right now you can get a 4-pack discounted to just $70, down from the $99 retail price. AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
Amazon is at it again with even more great deals on some popular Apple products, including the iPad Air in both 13″ and 11″ display sizes, great deals on Apple Watch Series 10, and an ongoing great deal on the 4-pack of AirTags. Why pay full price when you don’t have to? Check out the deals!

M2 iPad Air 13″ or 11″ – $499 & $799 ($100 off)

Amazon is offering nice discounts on the M2 iPad Air series, in both 13″ and 11″ screen sizes. The deals take at least $100 off the retail price, but if you want much larger storage you can get up to $200 off on those models too. The M2 iPad Air features flicker-free LCD display, M2 chip with Apple Intelligence support, 12MP front camera with center stage, 12MP rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, 128GB starting storage, and there are multiple color options available along with both the 13″ and 11″ screen sizes.

  • 13″ M2 iPad Air – $799 (down from $899)
  • 11″ M2 iPad Air – $499 (down from $599)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

The latest Apple Watch Series 10 model is available at a great 18% discount on Amazon, coming in at just $329, and down from the $399 retail price from Apple. Explore the different color and band options, and find one that you like best. Apple Watch Series 10 has some great features like a larger 42mm always-on display, all-day battery life, fitness and activity tracking, a heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, water resistance, voice control, Siri, and more.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP)

AirTags 4-pack for $70 (down from $99)

AirTags great little tracking devices to keep track of your stuff, whether it’s luggage, a backpack, pets, belongings, purse, car keys, dog, cat, packages, a car, bike, scooter, you name it. These are super handy, and right now you can get a 4-pack discounted to just $70, down from the $99 retail price.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
